actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize military recreational facilities to be used by any veteran with a compensable service-connected disability.

summary.text: Permits a veteran with a compensable service-connected disability and his or her dependents to use military morale, welfare, and recreational facilities on the same basis as members (and their dependents) entitled to retired pay.

titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize military recreational facilities to be used by any veteran with a compensable service-connected disability.
